text: Jersey Royal Hospital in Saint Helier is the main hospital on the island of Jersey. It was started in 1765. There is also a psychiatric hospital - St Saviour's Hospital which opened in 1868. It works with with the University of Southampton School of Medicine. There are 219 beds. It does not provide all specialist services. Some people have to go to England to see specialist doctors. It started an Electronic Patient Record system in July 2023. ==References== Category:Jersey Category:Hospitals in the United Kingdom
title: Jersey Royal Hospital
